ColourWords.Title: Articles
ColourWords.Instruction: Click on the incorrect words. There are one or two incorrect words in each sentence. These words could be removed or replaced with other articles.

Content.Sentence: 1. The government is focussing its healthy eating campaign on the young people.
2. I’m staying in a Hilton in room 406.
3. Finding the job after university is a real problem for the today’s students.
4. There is a beautiful countryside in the southern parts of the country.
5. I think I saw her the last week.
6. I try not to drink the coffee in the afternoons.
7. Let’s have a break now for the lunch.
8. It was a very interesting film from the my point of view.
9. She doesn’t usually leave the work until 10pm.
10. A charge for the excess luggage is 15 Euro per the kilo.
